mapper.sql: SELECT f.file_id, f.description, f.mimetype, f.size, f.filename, ft.file_type_id, ft.name
mapper.select: FROM file AS f LEFT OUTER JOIN file_type AS ft ON f.file_type_id = ft.file_type_id WHERE f.file_id = #{file_id}
FROM inventory_file AS ivf JOIN file AS f ON f.file_id = ivf.file_id LEFT OUTER JOIN file_type AS ft ON ft.file_type_id = f.file_type_id WHERE ivf.inventory_id = #{inventory_id}
FROM well_file AS wf JOIN file AS f ON f.file_id = wf.file_id LEFT OUTER JOIN file_type AS ft ON ft.file_type_id = f.file_type_id WHERE wf.well_id = #{well_id}
